author: cnbc.com
title: Brookwoods Group Expands Staffing and Recruiting Services to Central Texas; Hires Beverly Camp to Lead New San Antonio Office
text:
HOUSTON, Brookwoods Group, a leading recruiting and staffing company focused on marketing, communications and other professionals in Texas, announced today that it has opened a new office in San Antonio to provide professional services to companies and organizations in Central Texas. The company also announced that it has hired Beverly Camp as business development manager to lead its new office.
"Brookwoods Group has been helping clients throughout Texas move their teams and companies forward with professional marketing and communications talent that fits their organizations," said John Sweney, president and CEO, Brookwoods Group. "Our proprietary process goes beyond finding the right skills — we match the soft skills each candidate needs to be successful within a particular environment and culture. For almost 20 years, we've successfully placed or worked with thousands of professionals from our Houston office and we're excited about helping companies in San Antonio, Austin and the surrounding areas."
Camp is a ninth-generation Texan who brings a lifetime of experience both living and working in San Antonio in various sectors, including banking, staffing, consultative sales and multimedia advertising sales. Combining her strong passion for marketing and communications with her acute understanding of the local community and culture, she can help clients fill demanding roles with top candidates.
"As soon as we met Beverly, we knew she was the right fit for our team," said Sweney. "San Antonio and Austin clients will certainly benefit from both her local insight and belief in the Brookwoods Group philosophy: Focus on finding the right people for demanding roles, who will help a company move forward. Do this while making sure there is a great experience for everyone involved and open communication throughout the process."
Brookwoods Group has been unique in Texas as the one marketing- and communications-focused staffing and recruiting firm that always offers its contract professionals corporate-style benefits — medical, dental, retirement, life insurance, holidays and personal time off — all intended to ultimately benefit great clients by providing every reason for great professionals to stay productive in great jobs.
Camp added, "Central Texas is growing as military, government, civil service and tourism remain steady and opportunities in high tech, health care, financial services, energy and manufacturing expand." Brookwoods Group, she said, has the perfect model to help companies, with the right marketing and communications people — both temporary and permanent — to support their growth.
About Brookwoods Group
Brookwoods Group understands just how important it is to match the right people with the right opportunities, to create more value for its clients. Since 1998, the company has been providing staffing, recruiting and program management services in marketing, communications and other positions for companies across Texas. From long-term, on-site contracts to permanent recruiting and contract-to-permanent assignments, Brookwoods Group uses a proven process to match unique people with unique roles. Please visit Brookwoods.com for more information.
